title: Making Plans To Live A Blessed Life | Joel Osteen
itunes:title: Making Plans To Live A Blessed Life | Joel Osteen
description:
If you want to see God's promises fulfilled in your life, you have to put actions behind your faith. Start taking steps toward what you're believing for, and get ready to see God show out in your life. 

Your best days are still ahead, and together we can make a difference in this world with the message of God's hope and love.

To give visit JoelOsteen.com/GiveHope

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
